statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 200000'); total=$((in + out)); pct=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.0f\", ($total / $size) * 100}"); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null) && [ -n "$branch" ] && git_info=" ($branch)" || git_info=""; printf '%s%s · %s · %s%%' "$dir" "$git_info" "$model" "$pct"
